songs.title: Pouya Phonk
songs.lyrics:
Don’t sleep on me hoe  YUH (x4)

Droppin the top and I never gon stop we been ridin the whip until we reach the top (x4)

I’m little pouya spiting this shit to ya, if you didn’t hear it from my mouth than that shit was a rumour
Runnin this game I’m the ruler, flow so nasty like freddy Krueger got yo bitch in the back of the lac or inside of the tac I don’t mac I just tap low, watup put that bitch in the trunk
Now she wanna get touched by the kid with the musical talent I manage to balance ??  ??
These haters be wildin and actin like animals, they goin crazy… for the love  of the money, you can’t never be lazy is in my flash I wish these haters to rest, you gotta stay busy these life it ain’t easy this shit is a test so I never do rest
I stay on my grind that’s down to the bone you ain’t on my level so leave me alone, please get to your knees and just do the daily D, that’s all I need
I’m feelin like killin your cat but no one won’t do it my homies will take it right that
Stare in my eyes and you tell me I’m whack, now do you mean that?  I now that’s the fact that you like some composure poser, sittin on top of your sofa leaning just chillin like codeine the soda, while I’m gettin this paper I told ya he was a poser
[I’m little pouya spiting this shit to ya, if you didn’t hear it from my mouth than that shit was a rumour
Runnin this game I’m the ruler, flow so nasty like freddy Krueger got yo bitch in the back of the lac or inside of the tac I don’t mac I just tap low, watup] (x2)

[outro]
YUH
SS bitch smart stunnas
305 dade county
